content.zh-cn: 修复内存泄漏问题，优化性能并修复bug。
content.en-us: Fix memory leak, optimize performance and fix bugs.

content.zh-cn: 支持1.19.50，添加自动内存压缩，优化实体AI性能，修复bug。
content.en-us: Support 1.19.50, add automatic memory compression, optimize entity AI performance, fix bugs.

content.zh-cn: 添加服务端权威、硬件压缩加速、Terra更新及性能优化，并修复众多bug。
content.en-us: Add server authority, hardware compression acceleration, Terra update and performance optimization, and fix many bugs.

content.zh-cn: 社区开发者SoBadFish开发了一款PNX专属的RPG魔法物品插件
content.en-us: Community developer SoBadFish developed a RPG magic-item plugin for PNX
